projects.name: Tribute
projects.description: This is a full HTML/CSS page tribute to Alain de Mon√©ys. He was a young French nobleman murdered on 16 August 1870 in the village of Hautefaye. It is part of the feecodecamp.org Responsive Web Design certification.

projects.name: Try Hard Go Pro
projects.description: This project uses Riot Games API to give League of Legends players statistics about their games. Backend was built with Java and migrated to Node.js. The frontend was built with backbone.js and bootstrap. It is no longer maintained.

projects.name: Happy
projects.description: This is a Work in progress. I wanted to draw something with CSS only (SCSS to be honest). I found a picture of the character named Happy from the anime Fairy Tails and I tried to reproduced it exactly. There is still work to do.
